elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is the detailed price?
elements.correctAnswer: The detailed price is the actual price to be paid in Swiss francs including public charges (VAT, beer and tobacco tax, etc.) and advance disposal charges.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What is the base price?
elements.correctAnswer: Base price = price per unit (kg, l, m, m2 etc.)

elements.name: question2
elements.title: When should the detailed price and when should the basic price be indicated?
elements.correctAnswer: For items displayed on the sales floor or in the shop window, the detailed price must be stated. The basic price must be stated for measurable goods. For measurable pre-packaged goods, the detailed price and the basic price must be indicated.
